thread.title: ADOPTABLE PET: Living Free
thread.title_full: ADOPTABLE PET: Living Free - Press Enterprise

author: The Press-Enterprise
title: ADOPTABLE PET: Living Free
text:
Updated: 2:44 p.m. ADOPTABLE PET: Living Free More Related article » Animal’s name: Goldie Hawn
Breed: Domestic medium hair
Color: Brown-and-gray tabby
DOB: April 16, 2015
About the animal: Goldie Hawn has soft, medium-length hair. She is very interested in her surroundings and studies new visitors before introducing herself. Goldie Hawn loves chasing toys and wrestling with her roommates.
Agency: Living Free is a donor-supported, 501(c)(3), nonprofit, no-kill animal sanctuary that saves, rehabilitates and finds qualified homes for orphaned and abused cats and dogs facing imminent shelter euthanasia.
Location: 54250 Keen Camp Road in Mountain Center, just 15 minutes outside of Idyllwild in the San Jacinto Mountains
Information: Cattery, 951-491-1898, living-free.org
Contact the writer: community@pe.com
